row.entry: darktable comes with general enhanced basecurve presets for several models. These are automatically applied to raw images for better colors and contrast.

sect4.title: Usage
sect4.para: The basecurve works in camera linear RGB. It is defined by two or more nodes. You can click on any node and drag to adjust; you can also create additional nodes by clicking on a curve segment between two nodes. In order to remove a node drag it outside of the diagram area.
